name: AstroKnights
description:
AstroKnights is a casual endless runner for Android. You play as an astronaut who has accidentally travelled back in time and has to reach his space ship to return home.

--

Game made with 2 classmates for a school project in a timespan of about 1,5 weeks.

Process document available in the download.

Me:  concept art, 3D models & textures

Gijs Billen: programming, level design, Unity

Jorrit De Locht: level design, gameplay, rigging & animation
